Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created PartnerApp.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created PartnerApp.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: arn:aws[a-z\-]*:sagemaker:[a-z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:partner-app/app-[A-Z0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Name.markdownDescription:
A name for the PartnerApp.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Type.markdownDescription:
The type of PartnerApp.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: lakera-guard | comet | deepchecks-llm-evaluation | fiddler  
Update requires: Replacement

ExecutionRoleArn.description: The execution role for the user.
ExecutionRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The execution role for the user.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z\-]*:iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

KmsKeyId.description: The AWS KMS customer managed key used to encrypt the data associated with the PartnerApp.
KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
The AWS KMS customer managed key used to encrypt the data associated with the PartnerApp.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: .*  
Update requires: Replacement

Tier.markdownDescription:
The tier of the PartnerApp.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Update requires: No interruption

EnableIamSessionBasedIdentity.description: Enables IAM Session based Identity for PartnerApp.
EnableIamSessionBasedIdentity.markdownDescription:
Enables IAM Session based Identity for PartnerApp.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

EnableAutoMinorVersionUpgrade.description: Enables automatic minor version upgrades for the PartnerApp.
EnableAutoMinorVersionUpgrade.markdownDescription:
Enables automatic minor version upgrades for the PartnerApp.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AppVersion.markdownDescription:
The version of the PartnerApp.

---

Required: No

---
